snippet: The fatal crash in Valhalla, N.Y., arrived amid a protracted reckoning for the beleaguered railroad, wrought by a series of stumbles since 2013.
abstract: Fatal crash of Metro-North train in Valhalla, NY, is latest in string of troubles railroad has experienced in last few years, including Dec 2013 crash in Bronx that killed four passengers and injured more than 70.
lead_paragraph: The fatal crash in Valhalla, N.Y., arrived amid a protracted reckoning for the beleaguered railroad, wrought by a series of stumbles since 2013.

headline.main: Metro-North Crash Brings New Trouble Amid String of Setbacks for Railroad
headline.print_headline: Crash Brings New Trouble for Railroad
